did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This holding consists of two items.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Edmund Wilson, Accession # 7122-b, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This holding was transferred from the Rare Book Division on August 29, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the uncorrected advance galley proof of The Bit Between My Teeth, A Literary Chronicle of 1950-1965, together with a letter, 1965 September 29, from Richard D. Holland, director of publicity, Farrar, Straus and Giroux, to Rochelle Girson, Saturday Reviewconcerning the book.

did.unittitle: Uncorrected Advance Bound Galley Proof of The Bit Between My Teeth: A Literary Chronicle of 1950-1965 1965

scopecontent.p: Published by Farrar, Strauss and Giroux, Inc., of New York

did.unittitle: Letter from Richard D. Holland, Director of Publicity, to Rochelle Girson, Saturday Review September 29, 1965

scopecontent.p: In this letter, Holland informs Girson that Wilson has made extensive revisions in the galleys of The Bit Between My Teethand asks her to inform reviewers of the fact.
